channel.title: React Native on Andrew Bancroft
channel.description: Recent content in React Native on Andrew Bancroft

item.title: Solving React Native’s “No bundle url present” Error
item.description:
I hit the “No bundle url present.” roadblock today and had to dig a bit to find the solution. I’m going to describe how I encountered the problem, and provide the solution that’s worked more than once for me, ever since I found the suggestion in the React Native GitHub repository.
The Problem You’ve got a React Native app. In the terminal, you run react-native run-ios. In the simulator, you hit a roadblock with the following error in a bright red screen:
